detailsDescription.after: for naming: they make your e-services easy to find and clear in what they offer.

eserviceDescriptionField.label: E-service description
eserviceDescriptionField.infoLabel: Include input and output data in the text. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

eserviceTechnologyField.label: Which technology is your API built with?

eserviceModeField.label: Does the e-service produce or receive data?

isSignalHubEnabled.title: Signal Hub: data change notification service

firstParagraph.after: that informs consumers when the e-service data changes.

secondParagraph.before: By enabling the feature, you appoint PagoPa S.p.A. as data processor by adopting the
secondParagraph.linkLabel: designation document of PagoPa S.p.A. as data processor

isSignalHubEnabled.switchLabel: I will notify data changes on Signal Hub
isSignalHubEnabled.alert: Before proceeding, make sure the designation document has been reviewed and approved by at least one administrator in your party.

delegationSection.title: Delegations
delegationSection.description: Refer to the <1>documentation</1> about how delegations work

delegationField.label: Can the e-service be consumed via delegation?
delegationField.switchLabel: I authorize that the e-service consumers can delegate other parties to subscribe on their behalf

clientAccessDelegableField.label: I authorize delegated data access
clientAccessDelegableField.checkboxLabel: I authorize that delegates can associate their own clients to the purposes they created as delegates for consuming. Refer to the <1>documentation</1> for more details

step1.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfo: The content of this step, except for the description, will no longer be editable after publishing the first version of the e-service.

stepPurpose.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfoAlert: The content of this step will no longer be editable after publishing the first version of the e-service.

purposeTableSection.title: Purposes
purposeTableSection.description: Indicate the use cases for which you intend to collect data. For each purpose you will need to fill out a risk analysis.
purposeTableSection.descriptionEServiceFromTemplate: You can review the risk analyses associated with this template.
purposeTableSection.noSelectedPurposesTooltip: At least one purpose is required to proceed

riskAnalysisNameSection.title: Purposes
riskAnalysisNameSection.description: Indicate a use case for which you intend to collect data and fill out the risk analysis.

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: The questionnaire questions will vary based on the answers provided. Changing a previous answer may change the subsequent questions.
riskAnalysisSection.personalDataAlert: Warning: do not enter personal data in the free text fields

descriptionField.label: What has changed in this version?

audienceField.label: Audience
audienceField.infoLabel: Represents the recipient of the voucher, i.e., your target resource. Questions? <1>Refer to the guide</1>

validation.min: The value cannot be lower than the API calls/day per consumer threshold

agreementApprovalPolicySection.title: Do you want to manually activate all received service requests?
agreementApprovalPolicySection.label: Yes, I will manually activate them

step3.attributesDescription: Below indicate all those attributes, certified, verified, or declared, that the consumer must have to request consuming the e-service

createAttributeDrawer.subtitle: Once created, you will find the attribute in the list of those available to be added to an e-service

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Review the technical documentation useful for implementing an integration with this e-service template.

description.rest: Fill in the following fields and the OpenAPI file will be automatically generated.
description.soap: Fill in the following fields and the WSDL file will be automatically generated.

description.rest: Upload the OpenAPI file describing the API. You must ensure that your specification complies with ModI requirements. To check, use
description.soap: Upload the WSDL file describing the API

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Enter the technical documentation useful for using this e-service

isSignalHubEnabled.label: Is the data update service (Signal Hub) available?

isConsumerDelegable.label: Can the e-service be consumed via delegation?

isClientAccessDelegable.label: Do you authorize delegated data access?

dailyCallsPerConsumer.label: Daily API call limit per consumer

notPublishableTooltip.label: One or more required fields have not been completed. Complete the draft

rejectedDelegatedVersionDraftAlert.delegate: The publication of this draft was rejected by the delegator. <1>Read the reasons for the rejection</1> and send the draft again with corrections.
rejectedDelegatedVersionDraftAlert.delegator: You have rejected the publication of this draft. <1>Read the reasons for the rejection here</1>.

importVersionDrawer.title: Import E-Service
importVersionDrawer.subtitle: For further questions and information <1>go to the manual</1>.
importVersionDrawer.disabledImportTooltip: You cannot import the file. You must first review and confirm the options.
importVersionDrawer.description: Before proceeding, check the following sections, then confirm and continue.

attributeInfoSection.label: Attributes
attributeInfoSection.description: If your e-service has attributes, you will need to enter them again after uploading this zip.

eserviceTitleInfoSection.label: Duplicate e-service title
eserviceTitleInfoSection.description: If there is already an e-service produced by your party with the same name as the one in this zip, the upload will fail.

structureInfoSection.label: Archive structure
structureInfoSection.description: If you have added/removed/renamed files inside the zip, you have updated the configuration file accordingly.

apiInterfaceInfoSection.label: API interface
apiInterfaceInfoSection.description: Make sure you have entered the correct server URLs for producing.

list.disabledTooltip: Test e-service archived from the catalog and not usable

tabs.ariaLabel: Two different tabs for e-service details and associated keychains

alert.suspended: This version of the e-service is suspended. Until it is reactivated, no consumer will be able to access the data produced through the API.
alert.deprecated: This version of the e-service is obsolete but still active. It will be automatically decommissioned by PDND when the last service request on this version is archived.

keychain.actionReservedToAdminTooltip: This action is reserved for users with administrator permissions

bottomActions.navigateVersions: Navigate to another version of the e-service
bottomActions.exportVersion: Download this version of the e-service
bottomActions.watchRiskyAnalysisAssociated: View the risk analysis of this e-service
